About

AI and Cloud Architect specializing in LLM platforms, RAG systems, and secure cloud architectures. I build serverless, event-driven microservices on AWS with multi-model stacks (OpenAI, Azure, Bedrock, Mistral). Led multi-tenant designs handling >1,000 concurrent connections and thousands of requests per second. Enforce ISO 27001 and SOC 2 compliance in ~3 months. Translate business needs into resilient, high-throughput systems.

View my projects and publications for details.

Outside Work

I love extreme sports. I am a certified skydiver (PJ(B) license), diver (Advanced Open Water), windsurfing and kitesurfing instructor, and I love snowboarding. These experiences build risk management, teaching, calm under pressure, and disciplined preparationâ€”skills that translate directly to technical leadership and crisis handling.

Experience

AI Architect and CTO specializing in enterprise LLM platforms, retrieval-augmented generation, and secure cloud architectures. Led multi-tenant designs integrating AWS Bedrock, Azure ML, OpenAI, and Mistral. Built event-driven backends with Lambda, ECS/Fargate, SNS/SQS for high throughput at controlled cost. Developed internal tooling like a prompt-optimization "wizard" and deterministic AI pipeline testbeds, moving teams from experiments to reliable production.

Previously at idealo, enabled login in 6 countries, yielding 1.4M new accounts in 3 months (700% over forecast). At T-Labs, built blockchain systems with Hyperledger. At SAS, designed real-time analytics for banking. Holds dual M.Sc. in Computer Science (TU Berlin, PW Warsaw). Works across architecture, security, and delivery to meet compliance and KPIs.
